name: Hide them
description:
You are a viking who killed a friend while drinking beer and you need to scape from the town with the body, avoiding the guards and killing them if they see you.
If you kill a guard, one more guard will spawn, and also you need to take that body with you.

Controls:
Left Click a place to go
Right Click to rotate the camera
Mouse Wheel to zoom in/out the camera
F to drag the bodies
D to jump and kill!

What is hidden in snow comes forth in the thaw
All the lies will be eventually discovered! Be aware!
